sections.text: The Cornell MBA develops principled, insightful leaders prepared for management across industries through a rigorous, customizable program.
The program combines a strong core in management fundamentals with experiential immersions and electives.

items: Transcripts, resume, essays, one letter of recommendation
TOEFL/IELTS required for non-native English speakers
sections.text: Applicants must hold a bachelor’s degree and provide required application materials; GMAT/GRE may be waived.
Graduates assume leadership roles in consulting, finance, technology, and entrepreneurship.
